    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message()
        Default constructor for the Message object.

      • Message

        public Message(int playerNum,
               java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String message,
               boolean turn,
               java.lang.String move)
        Main constructor for the Message object.
        Parameters:
        playerNum - - an integer assigned to a player determining whether they are player 1 or 2.
        username - - the user name set by the player.
        message - - a chat or disconnect message sent by the player.
        turn - - a boolean value used to determine which player has the first move upon connecting to another player.
        move - - a String value representing a specific move on the game board.
